summary: This mod offers a choice of several companions (Molag Bal, Mara, Draugir, DwarvDoll, Minotaur, Ashlotte)
descriptionHtml:
This mod offers a choice of several companions

[color=#00ff00][b]Optional Files: Esp versions Fr.[/b][/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/dOCipTO.gif[/img]

1) [b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Molag Bal Companion [/size][/color][/b](No DLC required; You can find him at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun; voice: Male Brute)

Thanks to Vicn in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?] Vicn Creature Pack [/url]



2) [b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Mara Companion [/size][/color][/b](No DLC required; You can find her at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun; voice: Dark Elf; new weapon: the Hammer of Mara)

Thanks to Vicn in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?] Vicn Creature Pack [/url]



3) [b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Draugir Companion [/size][/color][/b](No DLC required; You can find him at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun; voice: Male Orc)

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Gendundrup [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49682/?]Nexus Creature Resource[/url]



4) [b][color=#ff0000][size=4]DwarvDoll Companion [/size][/color][/b](No DLC required; You can find her at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun; voice: Female Commander; new weapons: Gynoid Crystal Great Sword, Gynoid Crystal Sword, Gynoid Great Sword, Gynoid Sword, Gynoid Battle Axe, Gynoid War Hammer )

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?] Vicn Creature Pack [/url]



5) Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Dogtown1 [/color] for the model of the [color=#ff0000][b][size=4]Minotaur[/size][/b] [/color]in his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35631/? ]SkyMoMod [/url]



6) Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]jackGa [/color] for the Mesh/Textures of the [color=#ff0000][b][size=4]Ashlotte[/size][/b][/color] in his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=222035755] JG Monsters [/url] ; [url=http://jacksh123.mysinablog.com/] JackGa Blog [/url] (Ashlotte is a freely inspired work based on the original creature of Soul Calibur IV from Namco Bandai)



[color=#00ff00][b]In the Miscellaneous Files[/b] [/color] you have "Companions of The Bannered Mare". This mod adds 6 Companions in the Bannered Mare (Whiterun)

This mod is a merging of my mods [i][b]Minotaur, DwarvDoll, Ashlotte, Molag Bal, Mara, Draugir [/b][/i][color=#ff0000][b][i][size=4]WARNING: If you install Companions of the Bannered Mare, you must uninstall these mods ![/size][/i][/b][/color]



You can also incarnate Draugir, Molag Bal, Minotaur, DwarvDoll and Mara in my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56537/?] Incarnate Creatures [/url]
author: gg77
